label: InputText
description: InputText is an extension to standard input element with theming and keyfiltering.

methods.label: Methods
methods.description: Defines methods that can be accessed by the component's reference.

values.name: focus

parameters.name: scrollTo
parameters.description: flag to control whether to scroll to the element, false by default.

values.description: Focus an input element if it does not already have focus.

values.name: blur
values.description: Blur an input element.

props.label: InputTextProps
props.description: Defines valid properties in InputText component. In addition to these, all properties of HTMLInputElement can be used in this component.

values.name: class
values.description: CSS classes to add to root element.

values.name: disabled
values.description: When present, it specifies that the element should be disabled.

values.name: keyfilter
values.description: Format definition of the keys to block.

values.name: invalid
values.description: When present, it specifies that the component should have invalid state style.

values.name: pt
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

values.name: ptOptions
values.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

values.name: style
values.description: Style to add to root element.

values.name: size
values.description: Size of the input.

values.name: tooltip
values.description: Content of the tooltip.

values.name: tooltipOptions
values.description: Configuration of the tooltip, refer to the tooltip documentation for more information.

values.name: unstyled
values.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

values.name: validateOnly
values.description: When enabled, instead of blocking keys, input is validated internally to test against the regular expression.

values.name: value
values.description: The value of component

values.name: variant
values.description: Specifies the input variant of the component.

callbacks.label: Callbacks
callbacks.description: Defines callbacks that determine the behavior of the component based on a given condition or report the actions that the component takes.

values.name: onInput
values.description: Callback to invoke while typing value on input

values.name: root
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the root's DOM element.

values.name: tooltip
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the Tooltip component.

types.label: Props types
types.description: Defines types used by properties of the InputText component.

ptContext.label: InputTextContext
ptContext.description: Defines current options in InputText component.

values.name: filled
values.description: Current filled state of the component as a boolean.

values.name: disabled
values.description: Current disabled state of the component as a boolean.
